item.title: 马来西亚安瓦尔表示将在 "适当时机 "削减燃油补贴
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）重申了削减浪费性支出的必要性，包括减少过多的补贴以降低政府债务水平，但没有承诺取消燃料优惠的时间表。【原文：Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim reiterated the need to cut wasteful spending, including reducing excess subsidies to trim government debt levels, while stopping short of committing a timeline to do away with fuel concessions.】

item.title: 利比亚逮捕走私 20 亿美元黄金的海关官员
item.description: 利比亚当局逮捕了几名海关高官，他们涉嫌走私价值约 20 亿美元黄金的企图被挫败。【原文：Libyan authorities arrested several high-ranking customs officials in connection with a foiled attempt to smuggle about $2 billion worth of gold.】

item.title: 对冲基金急于在美国通胀前回补欧元空头押注
item.description: 货币交易员们认为欧元将走强，因为他们押注美国通胀走软将使大西洋两岸的货币政策前景更加一致。【原文：Currency traders are positioning for a stronger euro, betting softer US inflation will bring the outlook for monetary policy on both sides of the Atlantic closer in sync.】

item.title: Meme-Stock 现象再现，GameStop 股价再次飙升
item.description: 在零售业狂潮再起的前一天，Meme-stock 交易员再次涌入 GameStop Corp. 和 AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc.【原文：Meme-stock traders again piled into GameStop Corp. and AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc., a day after shares of both firms soared in a revival of the retail frenzy.】

item.title: Cosatu 表示，盎格鲁集团对南非的承诺受到工会欢迎
item.description: 在英美资源集团公布退出钻石和铂金业务的战略，以抵御竞争对手必和必拓集团（BHP Group）340 亿英镑（430 亿美元）的收购之后，南非最大的工会联合会--南非工会大会（Congress of South African Trade Unions）表示，欢迎英美资源集团对南非的承诺。【原文：The Congress of South African Trade Unions, the country’s biggest federation of labor groups, said it welcomed Anglo American’s Plc’s commitment to the country after the company unveiled a strategy to exit diamond and platinum businesses as it seeks to fend off a £34 billion ($43 billion) takeover approach from rival BHP Group.】

item.title: 德国联邦金融管理局称，欧洲需要更简单而非更宽松的金融规则
item.description: 德国最高金融监管机构表示，欧盟需要减少监管的复杂性，以帮助银行和投资者为其经济改革提供资金，同时反击了放宽资本标准的呼吁。【原文：The European Union needs less complex regulation to help banks and investors fund the overhaul of its economy, Germany’s top financial watchdog said, while pushing back against calls to soften capital standards.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织总裁格奥尔基耶娃敦促赞比亚债券持有人批准改革
item.description: 国际货币基金组织总裁克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃（Kristalina Georgieva）表示，在赞比亚政府宣布启动票据重组进程后，赞比亚的国际债券持有人应迅速完成票据重组。【原文：Zambia’s international bondholders should quickly complete the restructuring of the notes after the government announced the start of the process, International Monetary Fund Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva said.】

item.title: 必和必拓的澳大利亚顶级投资者希望在盎格鲁争夺战中保持克制
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group Ltd）在澳大利亚的最大股东、养老金巨头 AustralianSuper 称，资本纪律对采矿业来说 "至关重要"，因为投资者正在权衡这家重量级企业为争取较小的竞争对手英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）而进行的两次努力。【原文：Pension giant AustralianSuper, BHP Group Ltd’s largest Australian shareholder, said capital discipline was of “utmost importance” for the mining industry as investors weigh the heavyweight’s twice-rebuffed efforts to woo smaller rival Anglo American Plc.】

item.title: 凯雷为大型巴士旅游公司提供超过 4 亿美元的私人债务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. is providing over $400 million of private credit loans to Big Bus Tours, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 萨瓦德尔在与 BBVA 接触后暂停股票回购计划
item.description: 在毕尔巴鄂维斯卡亚阿根廷银行（Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA）直接向股东提出要约后，萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）表示已暂停其股票回购计划。【原文：Banco Sabadell SA said it has suspended its share buyback program after Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA took its offer directly to shareholders.】

item.title: 通胀担忧缓解，挪威加大石油财富支出
item.description: 挪威计划从其1.6万亿美元的主权财富基金中支出比早先计划更多的资金，以帮助这个北欧国家的经济在降息预期推迟的情况下渡过难关。【原文：Norway plans to spend more of its $1.6 trillion sovereign wealth fund than planned earlier, helping the Nordic nation’s economy overcome a soft patch amid an expected delay in interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团将退出钻石和铂金业务，以抵御必和必拓的挑战
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）计划退出钻石、铂金和煤炭开采业，这是该公司 107 年历史上最大的动荡之一，因为该矿商正在努力抵御其更大竞争对手必和必拓集团（BHP Group）的收购。【原文：Anglo American Plc plans to exit diamond, platinum, and coal mining in one of the biggest shake-ups in the company’s 107-year history, as the miner seeks to fight off a takeover approach from its bigger rival BHP Group.】

item.title: 英国失业率升至去年夏季以来最高点
item.description: 英国失业率连续第三个月上升，这一数据可能使英国央行更有信心地认为，劳动力市场正在降温，足以在未来几个月内降息。【原文：UK unemployment rose for a third month, figures likely to give the Bank of England more confidence that the labor market is cooling sufficiently to cut interest rates in the coming months.】

item.title: 沙特年度最大 IPO 吸引 910 亿美元订单
item.description: 投资者为沙特一家医院集团的首次公开募股下达了 910 亿美元的订单，这将成为沙特王国今年最大的上市项目。【原文：Investors put in $91 billion of orders for the initial public offering of a Saudi hospital group that’s set to be the kingdom’s biggest listing of the year.】

item.title: 英国工资增长超预期，失业率却在上升
德国储蓄银行将出售 9 亿欧元美国和英国贷款
item.description: 德国复兴信贷银行（Deutsche Pfandbriefbank AG）表示，在这家德国房地产贷款机构努力应对房地产市场恶化的影响之际，它将出售约 9 亿欧元（9.71 亿美元）的美国和英国贷款。【原文：Deutsche Pfandbriefbank AG said it will sell about €900 million ($971 million) in US and UK loans as the German real estate lender grapples with the fallout from deteriorating property markets.】

item.title: 高盛称即将到期的韩国国债可能提振香港股市
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The monthslong rally in Hong Kong-listed Chinese equities may soon get a boost from maturing South Korean structured notes tied to them, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 卡塔尔将 "解放 "旅游业，以延长世界杯后的繁荣期
item.description: 自 2022 年举办国际足联世界杯足球赛以来，游客数量屡创新高，卡塔尔计划在此基础上放开酒店业。【原文：Qatar plans to liberalize its hospitality industry to build on the record number of tourists thronging the nation since it hosted the FIFA World Cup in 2022.】

item.title: 铜价升至两年来最高点，多头看到了赤字
item.description: 在全球供应缺口不断扩大的预测推动下，铜价强劲反弹，触及 2022 年以来的最高水平。【原文：Copper touched its highest level since 2022 after a powerful rally fueled by forecasts of a growing global supply deficit.】

item.title: 律师称对冲基金经理菲利普斯不该入狱
item.description: Glen Point Capital 联合创始人尼尔-菲利普斯（Neil Phillips）去年因操纵美元兑南非兰特汇率被判有罪，他的律师在一份法庭文件中称，他不应该在监狱服刑。【原文：Glen Point Capital co-founder Neil Phillips, who was found guilty last year of manipulating the US dollar-South African rand exchange rate, shouldn’t have to serve any time in prison, his lawyers argued in a court filing.】

item.title: 欧元区工资问题令欧洲央行对降息保持谨慎
item.description: 欧元区工人年初的工资增长强劲，但这对欧洲中央银行官员们思考如何降低利率的紧张情绪并无多大帮助。【原文：Robust early-year wage growth for euro-area workers will do little to calm the nerves of European Central Bank officials pondering how much they can lower interest rates.】

item.title: Capital A 的 Teleport 目标是在分拆航空公司后实现快速增长
item.description: Capital A Bhd.首席执行官皮特-查龙旺萨（Pete Chareonwongsak）表示，该集团的物流部门 Teleport 将不会受到该集团即将剥离航空资产的影响，并怀有自己的首次公开募股（IPO）野心。【原文：Capital A Bhd.’s logistics arm Teleport won’t be hampered by the imminent spinoff of the group’s airline assets and harbors its own IPO ambitions, Chief Executive Officer Pete Chareonwongsak said.】

item.title: 中国大型银行启动 83 亿美元减亏债券销售活动
item.description: 中国最大的两家国有银行将从本周起出售总计 600 亿元人民币（83 亿美元）的总损失吸收能力债券，这是中国贷款机构首次出售此类债券，以补充资本并支持世界第二大经济体的增长。【原文：Two of China’s biggest state banks will sell a combined 60 billion yuan ($8.3 billion) of total loss-absorbing capacity bonds starting this week, the first such debt sales by Chinese lenders in a drive to replenish capital and support growth of the world’s No. 2 economy.】

item.title: 欺诈担忧为印度蓬勃发展的小型 IPO 亮起红旗
item.description: 印度证券监管机构本月揭露的一连串会计欺诈案，给小企业股价的暴涨带来了另一个风险。【原文：A string of accounting frauds unearthed by India’s securities regulator this month poses another risk to the blistering rally in shares of tiny businesses.】

item.title: 长江资产将香港房屋价格下调三分之一以促进销售
item.description: 随着市场竞争的白热化，香港开发商长江资产控股有限公司（CK Asset Holdings Ltd. ）已将部分住宅的价格削减了三分之一。【原文：Hong Kong developer CK Asset Holdings Ltd. has slashed prices for some homes by a third, as market competition heats up.】

item.title: 喜达屋财团提出收购要约后，ESR 跃升幅度创 2020 年以来之最
item.description: 在 ESR 集团有限公司收到一个投资者财团提出的非约束性收购建议后，该公司股价攀升至四年多来的最高点，这证实了彭博新闻社早些时候的报道。【原文：ESR Group Ltd. shares climbed the most in more than four years after the firm received a non-binding takeover proposal from a consortium of investors, confirming an earlier Bloomberg News report.】

item.title: 日本首相铃木认为有必要与日本央行保持密切协调
item.description: 日本财务大臣铃木俊一强调了政府与日本央行之间协调与合作的重要性，以确保它们在追求政策目标时不会相互阻碍。【原文：Japanese Minister of Finance Shunichi Suzuki stressed the importance of coordination and collaboration between the government and the Bank of Japan to ensure they don’t hinder each other in pursuing their policy objectives.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称沃尔玛将裁减或迁移数百个公司职位
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》援引知情人士的话报道，沃尔玛公司正在裁减数百个公司职位，并要求大多数远程员工返回办公室。【原文：Walmart Inc. is axing hundreds of corporate jobs and asking most remote workers to return to offices, the Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰聘请阿卜杜勒卡里姆负责中东地区的筹资工作
item.description: 根据彭博社获得的一份声明，蓝猫资本公司（Blue Owl Capital Inc.【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc. has hired Haitham Abdulkarim to oversee the company’s institutional business in the Middle East, where he’ll focus on scaling investment and operations teams across Abu Dhabi and Dubai, according to a statement provided to Bloomberg.】
